author: Carrie Townsend
content: We recently used Elliott's bouncy castles for our Year 6 leavers party. They did us a fantastic deal, the equipment was clean, safe and brilliant and the children had an amazing time. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to anyone. Five star service all the way through, responded quickly, dropped off & picked up as requested. I wouldn't look to use anyone else in the future for similar events, will definitely book again.
